history.content: pretty sure you need to retake 54 here. (friend was in similar situation)

Hi all,

I am a currently undeclared, intended L&S CS sophomore (3.0/7 class admissions group) and took math 54 P/NP last semester and did not pass the class. (My workload became too heavy due to skipping 1B and going straight to this class, among other things, and I changed grading options on the last day possible since I knew I wouldn't do well and needed to master the fundamentals first and then come back later). 

My question is, am I allowed to take a Math 54 equivalent class at a community college over the summer, or must I retake Math 54 at Berkeley in order to be admitted to the major?

I will be finishing all of my prereqs except for 54 and 61c this semester, and I fear my workload will be too big if I try to take 54, 61c, EE16A, and Cog Sci 1 during the fall, and I must declare by then.
history.subject: Can I Retake NP Class at Other College?
